ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 18 Feb 2000 srutkowski@... wrote:
>
> Cool thought Gaelaian. An you should be able to run away
> from anything in the game, except one- Hasten
> Bootstrutter. One hint to high level bards- don't use

Interesting note about him. Normally, if you attack a mob
that /cons amiably, it turns threatening and attacks me back.
Hasten is amiable to me. I charmed a hill giant just as he
attacked it, and the giant attacked him back. I was getting
ready to zone, Hasten killed the giant, then went on his merry
way. I conned him and he was dubious to me. Apparently
having a pet auto-defend against a mob is not as big a combat
faction hit as attacking the mob directly.


--
John H. Kim
